column1: filepath from the root of magento folder to the config file, if file is not exist no errors will be thrown, so you can just not to create file if you don't want to
column2: filepath from the root of magento folder to the config file, if file is not exist no errors will be thrown, so you can just not to create file if you don't want to

column1: url where config will be loaded from, leave it empty if don't want to load config from url
column2: url where config will be loaded from, leave it empty if don't want to load config from url
